snippet.title: Chicago at night: The Blackhawks and winter collide at Soldier Field
snippet.description:
Chicago at night: The Blackhawks and winter collide at Soldier Field by Ricky O'Donnell on Mar 3 2014, 1:21p
The Blackhawks won at Soldier Field on Saturday night. So did winter. SB Nation's Ricky O'Donnell was there.

snippet.title: Beach volleyball, fireworks and KISS: The NHL at Dodger Stadium
snippet.description:
Beach volleyball, fireworks and KISS: The NHL at Dodger Stadium by Bill Hanstock on Jan 28 2014, 11:56a
The first outdoor ice hockey spectacle in Southern California doubled down on "spectacle." A look at the good and the bad of manufacturing an experience.

snippet.title: Jim Harbaugh calls Michael Crabtree the 'greatest catcher of all time'
snippet.description:
Jim Harbaugh calls Michael Crabtree the 'greatest catcher of all time' by James Brady on Jan 6 2014, 9:00a
Harbaugh is no stranger to screeching loudly, spinning around in circles like a madman or spouting hyperbole ... he did all of those things on Sunday.

snippet.title: The Post-Mortem, Week 17: A horrific scheduling proposal
snippet.description:
The Post-Mortem, Week 17: A horrific scheduling proposal by Celebrity Hot Tub on Dec 31 2013, 12:20p
It's great for Drew Brees. It's terrible for the Bucs, and every non-Saints fan with dignity.

snippet.title: NBA schedule: Heat rally past Pacers in Eastern battle
snippet.description:
NBA schedule: Heat rally past Pacers in Eastern battle by Matt Conner on Dec 18 2013, 6:49p
Miami played from behind much of the night, but surged late and evened its season series with the Pacers with a 97-94 victory on Wednesday.

snippet.title: NBA viewing guide: Pacers visit Heat in Eastern Conference showdown
snippet.description:
NBA viewing guide: Pacers visit Heat in Eastern Conference showdown by Kevin Zimmerman on Dec 18 2013, 6:41p
LeBron James will play for the Miami Heat against the Indiana Pacers despite an ankle injury.

snippet.title: The melting pot: How the Spurs keep churning along
snippet.description:
The melting pot: How the Spurs keep churning along by Holly MacKenzie on Dec 17 2013, 2:00p
Every year, San Antonio brings in different players from different cultures. Yet they blend together so easily because of the infrastructure the franchise has built.

snippet.title: NHL Friday: Panthers ice Ovechkin, Capitals
snippet.description:
NHL Friday: Panthers ice Ovechkin, Capitals by Eric Stephen on Dec 13 2013, 6:33p
The Panthers cooled red-hot Alexander Ovechkin, keeping him off the scoresheet and taking a 3-2 shootout victory over the Capitals.

snippet.title: This train: When two unlikely teams met in the SEC Championship, we saw a glimpse into the future of the conference
snippet.description:
This train: When two unlikely teams met in the SEC Championship, we saw a glimpse into the future of the conference by Bill Connelly on Dec 12 2013, 12:14p
"This train is bound for _____." The MARTA train splits Atlanta into four quadrants and greets you with this introduction every time you board. It is both a statement of fact and a nod to...

snippet.title: Hope on the high plains: Welcome to Wyoming, where one of Division I football's smallest and most passionate fan bases is braving the weather and waiting for a winner
snippet.description:
Hope on the high plains: Welcome to Wyoming, where one of Division I football's smallest and most passionate fan bases is braving the weather and waiting for a winner by Steven Godfrey on Nov 14 2013, 11:39a
It's a 1976 Chinook. Bryan Stevens bought it from his parents, who bought it from his grandparents. There were countless camping trips in the Chinook, the interior of which still sports a...
